markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Cross the Threshold](/Feats.aspx?ID=2713) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost Eater](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=92)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Eater Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2710)

</column>

---

You can cast [_ethereal jaunt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=105) as an occult innate spell once per day. You don't need to Sustain the Spell; instead, it lasts for 10 minutes or until you choose to return to your material form as a free action.
name: Cross the Threshold
